name: Metal Man Reloaded
overview: You play the role of Matthew 'Metal Man' Cranston, a police officer fighting against Mafia syndicates in a futuristic New York. Your job is to fight your way through the various clans and the machines protecting them in order to reach and eliminate the Godfather of the syndicates Frank Slayer. The game is a primarily a platform shooter, split over five missions and requires you to complete a task before progressing such as collecting a certain number of items or deactivating bombs within a time limit. There are also secrets to find which garner extra points on completion of a level. Power-ups can be collected such as shields and armour-piercing bullets and without them some enemies are best avoided. The game style will be familiar to anyone who played late eighties or early nineties titles such as Total Recall or RoboCop 2.
